position.zh-cn: 革委会副主任、副校长兼党总支副书记
position.en: Vice Chairman of the Revolutionary Committee, Vice Principal and Deputy Secretary of the Party General Branch

description.zh-cn: 在百万大裁军的背景下，王健林从军队转业到地方政府工作，为其后来的商业生涯奠定了基础。
description.en: Against the backdrop of the million-man troop reduction, Wang Jianlin transferred from the army to local government, laying the foundation for his later business career.

relationships.source: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2012年，万达集团以26亿美元并购了美国AMC影院公司。
description.en: In 2012, Wanda Group acquired the American cinema company AMC for $2.6 billion.

relationships.source: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 万达集团向融创中国出售了13个文化旅游项目91%的股权。
description.en: Wanda Group sold 91% of its stake in 13 cultural tourism projects to Sunac China.

relationships.source: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 万达集团向富力地产出售了旗下77家酒店项目。
description.en: Wanda Group sold 77 of its hotel projects to R&F Properties.

relationships.source: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 万达集团将大连万达足球俱乐部及相关资产出售给实德集团。
description.en: Wanda Group sold the Dalian Wanda Football Club and related assets to Shide Group.

relationships.source: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 万达集团与中国足协达成战略合作，承诺三年内至少出资5亿元人民币支持中国足球振兴。
description.en: Wanda Group reached a strategic cooperation with the Chinese Football Association, promising to invest at least 500 million RMB over three years to support the revitalization of Chinese football.

description.zh-cn: 由于冠状病毒大流行，王健林的房地产和影视事业急剧下降，导致其财富缩水并跌出富豪榜前列。
description.en: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, Wang Jianlin's real estate and film businesses declined sharply, causing his wealth to shrink and drop him from the top ranks of the rich list.

relationships.source: 甘肃省兰州市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 因下属项目公司经济纠纷，对王健林实施了短暂的限制消费令。
description.en: A temporary consumption restriction order was imposed on Wang Jianlin due to an economic dispute involving a subordinate project company.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是习近平的姐姐。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is Xi Jinping's older sister.

relationships.target: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 该公司曾入股万达集团旗下的万达商业地产，并在其上市前转让了全部股票。
description.en: The company invested in Wanda Commercial Properties, a subsidiary of Wanda Group, and sold all its shares before the IPO.

description.zh-cn: 王健林在一次演讲中发表了将万达与海尔进行对比的言论，称万达坚持诚信经营“比海尔家砸几个冰箱，不知伟大到哪里去了”，引发海尔官方微博的回应和网络热议。
description.en: In a speech, Wang Jianlin made a comment comparing Wanda with Haier, stating that Wanda's commitment to integrity was 'immeasurably greater than Haier smashing a few refrigerators,' which triggered a response from Haier's official Weibo account and a heated public discussion.
